00243    /* 
00244    * Read parameters from file.
00245    */
00246    template <class Interaction>
00247    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00248    {
00249       if (!isCopy_) {
00250          readBegin(in, "DihedralPotential");
00251          interaction().setNDihedralType(simulation().nDihedralType());
00252          bool nextIndent = false;
00253          readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00254          readEnd(in);
00255       }
00256    }

00262    inline double DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::
00263       energy(const Vector& R1, const Vector& R2, const Vector& R3, int typeId) const
00264    {  return interaction().energy(R1, R2, R3, typeId); }

00268    */
00269    template <class Interaction>

00271       force(const Vector& R1, const Vector& R2, const Vector& R3,
00272             Vector& F1, Vector& F2, Vector& F3, int typeId) const
00273    {  interaction().force(R1, R2, R3, F1, F2, F3, typeId); }

00275    /*
00276    * Return dihedral energy for one Atom.
00277    */
00278    template <class Interaction>
00279    double DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::atomEnergy(const Atom &atom) 
00280    const
00281    {
00282       Species::AtomDihedralArray dihedrals;
00283       const  Dihedral* dihedralPtr;
00284       int    iDihedral;
00285       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00286       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00287       Vector dr3; // R[3] - R[2]
00288       double energy = 0.0;
00289 
00290       atom.molecule().species().getAtomDihedrals(atom, dihedrals);
00291       for (iDihedral = 0; iDihedral < dihedrals.size(); ++iDihedral) {
00292          dihedralPtr = dihedrals[iDihedral];
00293          boundary().distanceSq(dihedralPtr->atom(1).position(),
00294                                dihedralPtr->atom(0).position(), dr1);
00295          boundary().distanceSq(dihedralPtr->atom(2).position(),
00296                                dihedralPtr->atom(1).position(), dr2);
00297          boundary().distanceSq(dihedralPtr->atom(3).position(),
00298                                dihedralPtr->atom(2).position(), dr3);
00299          energy += interaction().energy(dr1, dr2, dr3,
00300                                              dihedralPtr->typeId());
00301       }
00302       return energy;
00303    }
00304 
00305    /*
00306    * Compute total dihedral energy for a System.
00307    */
00308    template <class Interaction>
00309    double DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy() const
00310    {
00311       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00312       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00313       Vector dr3; // R[3] - R[2]
00314       double energy = 0.0;
00315       System::ConstMoleculeIterator  molIter;
00316       Molecule::ConstDihedralIterator dihedralIter;
00317 
00318       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00319          if (simulation().species(iSpec).nDihedral() > 0) {
00320             for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00321                molIter->begin(dihedralIter); 
00322                for ( ; dihedralIter.notEnd(); ++dihedralIter){
00323                   boundary().distanceSq(dihedralIter->atom(1).position(),
00324                                         dihedralIter->atom(0).position(), dr1);
00325                   boundary().distanceSq(dihedralIter->atom(2).position(),
00326                                         dihedralIter->atom(1).position(), dr2);
00327                   boundary().distanceSq(dihedralIter->atom(3).position(),
00328                                         dihedralIter->atom(2).position(), dr3);
00329                   energy += interaction().
00330                             energy(dr1, dr2, dr3, dihedralIter->typeId());
00331                }
00332             }
00333          }
00334       }
00335 
00336       return energy;
00337    }
00338 
00339    /* 
00340    * Add dihedral forces to atomic forces.
00341    */
00342    template <class Interaction>
00343    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces() 
00344    {
00345       Vector dr1, dr2, dr3, force1, force2, force3;
00346       Atom *atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr, *atom2Ptr, *atom3Ptr;
00347       int iSpec;
00348 
00349       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00350       Molecule::DihedralIterator dihedralIter;
00351       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00352          if (simulation().species(iSpec).nDihedral() > 0) {
00353             for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00354                molIter->begin(dihedralIter); 
00355                for ( ; dihedralIter.notEnd(); ++dihedralIter) {
00356 
00357                   atom0Ptr = &(dihedralIter->atom(0));
00358                   atom1Ptr = &(dihedralIter->atom(1));
00359                   atom2Ptr = &(dihedralIter->atom(2));
00360                   atom3Ptr = &(dihedralIter->atom(3));
00361 
00362                   boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00363                                         atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00364                   boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00365                                         atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00366                   boundary().distanceSq(atom3Ptr->position(),
00367                                         atom2Ptr->position(), dr3);
00368                   interaction().force(dr1, dr2, dr3,
00369                      force1, force2, force3, dihedralIter->typeId());
00370 
00371                   atom0Ptr->force() += force1;
00372                   atom1Ptr->force() -= force1;
00373                   atom1Ptr->force() += force2;
00374                   atom2Ptr->force() -= force2;
00375                   atom2Ptr->force() += force3;
00376                   atom3Ptr->force() -= force3;
00377                }
00378             }
00379          }
00380       }
00381    }
00382 
00383    /* 
00384    * Add dihedral contribution to stress.
00385    */
00386    template <class Interaction>
00387    template <typename T>
00388    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStressImpl(T& stress) const
00389    {
00390       Vector dr1, dr2, dr3, force1, force2, force3;
00391 
00392       setToZero(stress);
00393 
00394       // Iterate over all dihedrals in System.
00395       System::ConstMoleculeIterator  molIter;
00396       Molecule::ConstDihedralIterator dihedralIter;
00397       for (int iSpec = 0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00398          if (simulation().species(iSpec).nDihedral() > 0) {
00399             for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00400                molIter->begin(dihedralIter);
00401                for ( ; dihedralIter.notEnd(); ++dihedralIter){
00402 
00403                   boundary().distanceSq(dihedralIter->atom(1).position(),
00404                                         dihedralIter->atom(0).position(), dr1);
00405                   boundary().distanceSq(dihedralIter->atom(2).position(),
00406                                         dihedralIter->atom(1).position(), dr2);
00407                   boundary().distanceSq(dihedralIter->atom(3).position(),
00408                                         dihedralIter->atom(2).position(), dr3);
00409 
00410                   interaction().force(dr1, dr2, dr3, force1, force2, force3, 
00411                                     dihedralIter->typeId());
00412 
00413                   dr1 *= -1.0;
00414                   dr2 *= -1.0;
00415                   dr3 *= -1.0;
00416                   incrementPairStress(force1, dr1, stress);
00417                   incrementPairStress(force2, dr2, stress);
00418                   incrementPairStress(force3, dr3, stress);
00419                }
00420             }
00421          }
00422       }
00423 
00424       stress /= boundary().volume();
00425       normalizeStress(stress);
00426    }
00427    template <class Interaction>
00428    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(double& stress) const
00429    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00430 
00431    template <class Interaction>
00432    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Vector& stress) 
00433         const
00434    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00435 
00436    template <class Interaction>
00437    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Tensor& stress) 
00438         const
00439    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }

00441    template <class Interaction>
00442    inline Interaction& DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::interaction()
00443    { return *interactionPtr_; }
00444 
00445    template <class Interaction>
00446    inline const Interaction& DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::interaction() const
00447    { return *interactionPtr_; }
